This is 100% a crop top. Cute. But not what was advertised. And not what I expected.

This is very comfy. I almost bought the extra small one, but I'm glad I bought it in a medium. The color is absolutely beautiful. The material's pretty thin and I love it. It wasn't that expensive and I could wear this around the house while I wear a bra. It's amazing.
I bought this for my summer job, we needed something bright and noticeable and this was perfect. The shirt is super lightweight without being cropped. And the hood is the best part
Good fit

Product is great, just as it shows. Material is very nice.

I am beyond bummed. This showed up no draw string, no tags, worn in the armpit area, fuzz all over and light stains. It still smelled like someone’s perfume.  Totally grossed out. I might try to reorder another one because it really is a cute top.

Good stretch; thickness of material was good; used this as a swim suit cover up/top

When I got the product, it fits me perfectly, I am 5’1” and 151 pounds at the moment. It’s light and will be good for hot, early fall Florida weather. The hood will be great to paint Oogie’s face on! Because I will be modifying this top for a costume, and because I like the way it fits and looks, I will most likely be buying others in different colors as well for normal wear!
Insanely cheap. Poorly made with terrible fabric. Pictures make it look like cotton or a semi-decent blend, but it's not. Do not waste your money or time it takes to return.

I am normally a xl. 173lb and 5'1. I ordered a xxl and it just did fit perfect. i love it and will order more colors.
True to color and cute

However, it's more of a belly shirt, which I don't care for...In order to feel comfortable wearing it I'd have to put another shirt under it...which would be too hot.  Cute shirt just needed to be longer.  I still kept it though!

It is long enough that my stomach doesn't show (unless, of course, I stretch my arms way above my head). The neon pink is really pretty, and not as obnoxious as I thought it might be. I really pleased with it!
Very cute, very comfy. I need it in a few more colors. It runs a bit small, so going a size up is a good idea.

The material is of good quality. The cut and fit is nice, good length not long, it falls on my hips. I like it.

I dropped a star because it is pricey.

I was going to Hawaii, needed cute shirts for my trip. This one had good reviews and might make it before my trip. I ordered, then I was notified it was coming early, then it was late again. I ordered it in green, and really like it minus the cheap draw string. I ended up pulling it out.
Cute top but disappointed with the quality. Arrived with a hole.
